name: dk_davion_monologue_01
text: I should probably just tell Mirana how I feel... which is stupid because she already KNOWS how I feel so I really shouldn't have to say anything.  This really shouldn't be this hard.  Gods, why am I thinking about Mirana when I need to be focusing on the ancients...The ancients.  One red. One blue.  Mirana looks great in blue.  Godsdamn it, focus!
text_simple: i should probably just tell mirana how i feel which is stupid because she already knows how i feel so i really shouldnt have to say anything this really shouldnt be this hard gods why am i thinking about mirana when i need to be focusing on the ancients the ancients one red one blue mirana looks great in blue godsdamn it focus

name: dk_davion_monologue_02
text: Luna says she's changed but I don't buy it.  She massacred Fymryn's family.  She occupied Coedwig and demanded forced conversion... it's not just wrong... it's despicable.
text_simple: luna says shes changed but i dont buy it she massacred fymryns family she occupied coedwig and demanded forced conversion its not just wrong its despicable

name: dk_davion_monologue_03
text: I don't agree with Invoker about a lot of things, but if there's one thing we're on the same page about it's that Selemene is a monster.  The world would be better off without her.
text_simple: i dont agree with invoker about a lot of things but if theres one thing were on the same page about its that selemene is a monster the world would be better off without her

name: dk_davion_monologue_04
text: Gods I hope that Mirana doesn't get sucked back into her little moon cult.  Selemene is a narcissist, Luna is a war criminal, and the Dark Moon Order are abunch of reglious zealots... if she goes back to them, it's like she's learned nothing...
text_simple: gods i hope that mirana doesnt get sucked back into her little moon cult selemene is a narcissist luna is a war criminal and the dark moon order are abunch of reglious zealots if she goes back to them its like shes learned nothing

name: dk_davion_monologue_05
text: One of these days I'm gonna go to White Spire with Axe and get drunk.   Like really drunk.  Like, let's get into a fight with a criminal mastermind and in killing them end up taking over their organization drunk.
text_simple: one of these days im gonna go to white spire with axe and get drunk like really drunk like lets get into a fight with a criminal mastermind and in killing them end up taking over their organization drunk

name: dk_davion_monologue_06
text: It's been too long since I've gone back to Dragon Hold... See Ritterfrau... see Kaden... see my friends.  My family.  I need to do them all proud.
text_simple: its been too long since ive gone back to dragon hold see ritterfrau see kaden see my friends my family i need to do them all proud

name: dk_davion_monologue_07
text: I should take Fymryn to Weeping Rose... if she really spent her whole life in Coedwig it would blow her mind.  Oh man, I should take Marci too, I could introduce her to Wei, those two would hit it off like crazy...
text_simple: i should take fymryn to weeping rose if she really spent her whole life in coedwig it would blow her mind oh man i should take marci too i could introduce her to wei those two would hit it off like crazy

name: dk_davion_monologue_08
text: It's hard... rectifying who I am, what I am, now.  It's getting more difficult  to tell where Slyrak ends and I begin... which means I'm responsible for what happened at Lethsham.  A city full of innocent people burned alive.  I don't know why Slyrak attacked, I may never know... but for the rest of my life I have to live what he did... and I have to make peace that people are right to hate me for it.
text_simple: its hard rectifying who i am what i am now its getting more difficult to tell where slyrak ends and i begin which means im responsible for what happened at lethsham a city full of innocent people burned alive i dont know why slyrak attacked i may never know but for the rest of my life i have to live what he did and i have to make peace that people are right to hate me for it

name: dk_davion_monologue_09
text: Maybe I shouldn't have given that kid in Hauptstadt the dragon's tooth... growing up in Dragon Hold wasn't easy.  You call those men and women your brothers... look up to them, and then some of them just... don't come home.  It's almost cruel: we give a home to those that lost families only to give them a new family that they get to lose all over again.
text_simple: maybe i shouldnt have given that kid in hauptstadt the dragons tooth growing up in dragon hold wasnt easy you call those men and women your brothers look up to them and then some of them just dont come home its almost cruel we give a home to those that lost families only to give them a new family that they get to lose all over again

name: dk_davion_monologue_10
text: Axe has Goodkind.  I have Bram.  Mirana has Marcie.  Only one thing left to do.  Start a band.
text_simple: axe has goodkind i have bram mirana has marcie only one thing left to do start a band

text: Am I gonna have to eat you later? I hate that.
text_simple: am i gonna have to eat you later i hate that
